Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject

set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.id = ..%Id() set proxy.fullName=..FullName.Value if (shortInfo = 1) quit proxy
set proxy.shortName=..ShortName.Value set proxy.legalAddress=..LegalAddress.Value set proxy.mailAddress=..MailAddress set proxy.webSite=..WebSite if (..Contact){ set proxy.contact=..Contact.ConvertToProxyObject() } quit proxy
